name: Spiritomb
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.

abilities.name: Sealing Scream
abilities.effect: Each player can’t play any ACE SPEC cards from his or her hand.

attacks.name: Hexed Mirror
attacks.effect: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw a number of cards equal to the number of cards in your opponent’s hand.
